fr.liglab.adele.cilia.dependency

Class DependencyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.Handler
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.PrimitiveHandler
        • fr.liglab.adele.cilia.dependency.DependencyHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependencyStateListener, org.apache.felix.ipojo.ConstructorInjector, org.apache.felix.ipojo.FieldInterceptor, org.apache.felix.ipojo.MethodInterceptor

    public class DependencyHandler
extends org.apache.felix.ipojo.PrimitiveHandler
implements DependencyStateListener
    The dependency handler manages a list of service dependencies.
    Author:
    Felix Project Team
